lines.value: jafnvagi getur visao til nokkurra hluta
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: valur snar gunnarsson f
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: agust 1976 er islenskur rithofundur blaoamaour ritstjori og fyrrum songvari rokkhljomsveitarinnar rikio sem flutti politiskt rokk
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 2000 gaf hann ut soloplotu reykjavik er kold bar sem hann song log eftir leonard cohen i eigin byoingu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 2003 gaf rikio ut fyrstu og einu plotu sina seljum allt meo textum eftir val
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: valur var bekktur fyrir ovenjulega sviosframkomu bar sem hann leitaoi ser fyrirmynda i ponkinu og meoal oheflaora rokkara
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: begar valur kom fram asamt rikinu var hann jafnan kladdur hermannajakka nokkrum numerum of litlum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: valur var ritstjori reykjavik grapevine til arsins 2005 og hefur eftir bao fengist vio skriftir og blaoamennsku m.a a dv og frettablaoinu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 2004 gaf hann ut ljooasafn a ensku a fool for believing owings mills md watermark 2004
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: hann hefur gefio ut tvar skaldsogur konungur noroursins harmsaga ilkka hampurilainen
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: 1 sem kom ut 2007 mal og menning og sioasti elskhuginn sem kom ut 2013 ormstunga og hafa bar baoar fengio gooa doma i 2015 gaf hann ut stutta avisogu paul luchterhand 1873-1923 og ario 2017 gaf hann ut orninn og falkinn skaldsaga mal og menning
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: rauoa skikkjan var kvikmynd framleidd ario 1967 i sameiningu af svium donum og islendingum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: hun var tekin a islandi og er i lit flestir leikarar myndarinnar voru sanskir eoa danskir en brir islendingar foru bo meo hlutverk i henni beir borgar garoarsson gisli alfreosson og flosi olafsson
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: sagan var byggo a sogu ur 7
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: bok gesta danorum eftir saxo grammaticus
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: borgarholtsskoli er framhaldsskoli vio mosaveg i grafarvogi i reykjavik
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: stofnao var til hans meo samningi islenska rikisins reykjavikurborgar og mosfellsbajar
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: var fra upphafi mioao vio ao skolinn hysti um 1000 nemendur i starfs- og boknami
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: i borgarholtsskola eru serhafoar starfsnamsbrautir svo sem a svioi malm- og biliona
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: skolinn keppti til urslita i spurningakeppni framhaldsskola arin 2001 2004 2005 og 2014
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: i urslitum 2001 topuou beir gegn mr i braoabana i urslitunum 2004 burftu beir einnig ao luta lagri haldi i braoabana bar sem verzlunarskoli islands bar sigur ur bytum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 2005 unnu beir ma i urslitum sem tryggoi borgarholtsskola sinn fyrsta gettu betur titil og ario 2014 topuou beir svo gegn mh i urslitum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: i lioi skolans ario 2001 voru hilmar mar gunnarsson samundur ari halldorsson og pall guomundsson
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 2004 og 2005 voru bao beir baldvin mar baldvinsson bjorgolfur guoni guobjornsson og steinbor helgi arnsteinsson
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 2014 voru bao svo beir arnor steinn ivarsson daniel oli olafsson og ingi erlingsson
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: skolanum hefur einnig vegnao vel i morfis malsku og rokraoukeppni framhaldsskolanna a islandi og ario 2004 komst skolinn i undanurslit
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: bao ar var hann hins vegar sleginn ut af baverandi og nuverandi brefoldum morfis meisturum verzlunarskola islands lio hans var skipao af borunni elisabet bogadottur davio gill jonssyni birni braga arnarssyni og ottari snadal
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: bjorn bor johannson friojon mar sveinbjornsson og johann fjalar skaptason skipuou morfis lio borgarholtsskola
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: * vefur borgarholtsskola
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: mai er 130
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: dagur arsins 131
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: a hlaupari samkvamt gregoriska timatalinu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: 235 dagar eru eftir af arinu

lines.value: bruna efnio reyndist vera oxio frumefnisins holmin og kallaoi hann bao holmiu en grana efnio var oxio aour obekkts frumefnis
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: cleve nefndi oxioio tuliu og frumefni bess tulin eftir tule sem er gamalt romverskt nafn yfir goosagnakennt land i norori vantanlega skandinaviu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: tulin finnst aldrei i hreinu formi i natturunni en finnst bo i litlum mali i steinum asamt oorum sjaldgafum jaromalmum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: bao er aoallega unnio ur monasiti ~0007% tulin ur straumseti meo jonskiptiaoferoum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: engin efnasambond tulins eru mikilvag ionaoi
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: natturulegt tulin er ur einu stoougu samsatu bess tm 169 1000% natturuleg gnago
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: efnio a ser 31 geislasamsatu sem hefur verio lyst og stoougastar beirra eru tm 171 sem hefur helmingunartimann 192 ar tm 170 meo helmingunartimann 1286 daga tm 168 meo helmingunartimann 931 daga og tm 167 meo helmingunartimann 925 klukkustundir
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: allar hinar geislasamsaturnar hafa helmingunartima undir 64 klukkustundum og meirihluti beirra undir 2 minutum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: tulin hefur einnig 14 systurkjarna og eru beir stoougustu tm 164m helmingunartimi 51 minuta tm 160m helmingunartimi 745 sekundur og tm 155m helmingunartimi 45 sekundur
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: samsatur tulins hafa atommassa fra 145966 tm-146 upp i 176949 tm-177
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: aoal sundrunarhattur bess aour en kemur ao algengustu stoougu samsatunni tm 169 er rafeindahremming og aoalsundrun eftir bao er betasundrun
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: aoaldotturefni bess aour en kemur ao tm 169 eru samsatur frumefnis 68 erbin og aoaldotturefni a eftir eru samsatur frumefnis 70 ytterbin
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: tulin er metio sem vagt eitur og skyldi meohondla bao meo aogat
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: af malmdufti bess stafar eld og sprengihatta
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: * webelements.com tulin
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 1525 mdxxv i romverskum tolum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: * liklega magnus jonsson pruoi syslumaour d
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: dain
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: distributed proofreaders islenska dreifoir profarkalesarar skammstofun dp er sjalfbooalioaverkefni sem mioar ao bvi ao koma prentuou mali a stafrant form meoal annars fyrir project gutenberg
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: dp var stofnao ario 2000 af charles frankcs til ao styoja vio stafrana yfirfarslu boka sem voru ekki haoar hugverkaretti
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: i dag er distributed proofreaders dp helsta auolind pg a svioi stafranna boka
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: allir profarkalesarar stjornendur forritarar og aorir eru sjalfbooalioar
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ferill hvers titils er eftirfarandi
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: islandsmeistari er einstaklingur eoa lio sem hefur unnio keppni i vissri ibrottagrein a islandsmoti i efstu deild viokomandi ibrottagreinar
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: motin geta tekio allt fra einum degi eoa spannao yfir starstan hluta arsins allt eftir bvi um hvaoa ibrottagrein er um ao raoa eoa hverjar reglurnar eru sem luta ao titlinum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: <onlyinclude> stjornuliffraoi eoa utlifsfraoi er undirgrein stjornufraoinnar og liffraoinnar sem fast vio rannsoknir a bvi hvort lifverur megi finna utan jaroar og ef svo er hver se uppruni beirra dreifing og brounarferli
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: beir sem leggja stund a greinina kallast stjornuliffraoingar eoa utlifsfraoingar
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: </onlyinclude>

lines.value: main article list of phases in this section we will present several systems that exhibit phase phenomena
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: we have discussed the solid liquid and gaseous phases of ordinary matter
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: it turns out that other configurations of molecules are possible corresponding to novel phases
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: amorphous solids or glasses are a phase intermediate between solids and liquids
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the atoms in an amorphous solid are aligned in a rigid disorderly structure instead of a regular lattice like an ordinary crystalline solid
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: liquid crystals are another phase intermediate between solids and liquids the atoms are held in place but are free to rotate
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in many materials there are actually a variety of solid phases each corresponding to a unique crystal structure
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: these varying crystal phases of the same substance are called allotropes if intramolecular bonding changes or polymorphs if only intermolecular bonding changes
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: for instance there are at least nine different polymorphs of ice that manifest under different temperature and pressure conditions
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: to take another example diamond and graphite are allotropes of carbon
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: graphite is composed of layers of hexagonally arranged carbon atoms in which each carbon atom is strongly bound to three neighboring atoms in the same layer and is weakly bound to atoms in the neighboring layers
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: by contrast in diamond each carbon atom is strongly bound to four neighboring carbon atoms in a cubic array
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the unique crystal structures of graphite and diamond are responsible for the vastly different properties of these two materials
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in an ordinary gas phase the electrons are tightly bound to the atomic nuclei
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in contrast in the plasma phase the atoms are dissociated i.e the electrons are separated from the atomic nuclei
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this dissociation or ionization occurs abruptly upon raising the temperature and lowering the pressure and thus displays the hallmarks of a phase transition
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: it is commonly stated that plasmas are the fourth state of matter but the above discussion shows that this statement is false
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: there is a huge variety of phases or states of matter depending on what physical properties you are looking at superfluids supersolids and bose einstein condensates are phases of matter that occur at extremely low temperatures near absolute zero
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: these temperatures are too low to occur anywhere on earth except in laboratory experiments
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the very slow motion of molecules at these temperatures allow some of the more bizarre aspects of quantum mechanics to manifest themselves in the form of novel macroscopic properties
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: under extremely high pressure ordinary matter undergoes a transition to a series of exotic phases collectively known as degenerate matter
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: these phases are of great interest to astrophysics because these high pressure conditions are believed to take place inside stars that have used up their nuclear fusion fuel such as white dwarfs and neutron stars
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: phase transitions also play an extremely important role in cosmology
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: it is believed that the universe as a whole underwent a series of important phase transitions during its early history shortly after the big bang
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: a major branch of theoretical cosmology inflation theory seeks to explain various aspects of the modern universe such as why the universe is so flat as the effect of one or more of these transitions
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: these transitions are of great interest to particle physics as well as it has been hypothesized that the quantum field that fills spacetime a particle physics concept that incorporates material particles like electrons as well as field like particles such as photons and gluons underwent a series of transitions from a highly symmetric phase in which all fundamental forces were unified into a single entity into the broken symmetry phase that we observe today in which there are four fundamental forces with very different strengths
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: main article phase diagram the different phases of a system may be represented using a phase diagram
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the axes of the diagrams are the relevant thermodynamic variables
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: for simple mechanical systems we generally use the pressure and temperature
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the following figure shows a phase diagram for a typical material exhibiting solid liquid and gaseous phases
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: a typical phase diagram
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the markings on the phase diagram show the points where the free energy is non analytic
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the open spaces where the free energy is analytic correspond to the phases
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the phases are separated by lines of non analyticity where phase transitions occur which are called phase boundaries
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in the above diagram the phase boundary between liquid and gas does not continue indefinitely
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: instead it terminates at a point on the phase diagram called the critical point
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this reflects the fact that at extremely high temperatures and pressures the liquid and gaseous phases become indistinguishable
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in water the critical point occurs at around 647 k 374 °c or 705 °f and 22.064 mpa
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the existence of the liquid gas critical point reveals a slight ambiguity in our above definitions
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: when going from the liquid to the gaseous phase one usually crosses the phase boundary but it is possible to choose a path that never crosses the boundary by going to the right of the critical point
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: thus phases can sometimes blend continuously into each other
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: we should note however that this does not always happen
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: for example it is impossible for the solid liquid phase boundary to end in a critical point in the same way as the liquid gas boundary because the solid and liquid phases have different symmetry
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: an interesting thing to note is that the solid liquid phase boundary in the phase diagram of most substances such as the one shown above has a positive slope
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this is due to the solid phase having a higher density than the liquid so that increasing the pressure increases the melting temperature
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: however in the phase diagram for water the solid liquid phase boundary has a negative slope
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this reflects the fact that ice has a lower density than water which is an unusual property for a material
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: sometimes a substance or mixture can be heated compressed etc beyond the point at which it would normally exhibit a phase change but without actually triggering the change
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: examples include supercooling superheating and supersaturation
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: such metastable states may sometimes be considered as phases although strictly speaking they are not because they are unstable
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: for example each polymorph of a given substance is usually only stable over a specific range of conditions
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: for example diamond is only stable at extremely high pressures
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: graphite is the stable form of carbon at normal atmospheric pressures
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: although diamond is not stable at atmospheric pressures and should transform to graphite we know that diamonds exist at these pressures
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this is because at normal temperatures the transformation from diamond to graphite is extremely slow
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: if we were to heat the diamond the rate of transformation would increase and the diamond would become graphite
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: however at normal temperatures the diamond can persist for a very long time
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: another important example of metastable polymorphs occurs in the processing of steel
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: steels are often subjected to a variety of thermal treatments designed to produce various combinations of stable and metastable iron phases
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in this way the steel properties such as hardness and strength can be adjusted by controlling the relative amounts and crystal sizes of the various phases that form
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the distribution of kinetic energy among molecules is not uniform and it changes randomly
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this means that at say the surface of a liquid there may be an individual molecule with enough kinetic energy to jump into the gas phase
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: likewise individual gas molecules may have low enough kinetic energy to join other molecules in the liquid phase
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this phenomena means that at any given temperature and pressure multiple phases may co exist
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: for example under standard conditions for temperature and pressure conditions a bowl of liquid water in dry air will evaporate until the partial pressure of gaseous water equals the vapor pressure of water
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: at this point the rate of molecules leaving and entering the liquid phase becomes the same due to the increased number of gaseous water molecules available to recondense
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the fact that liquid molecules with above average kinetic energy have been removed from the bowl results in evaporative cooling
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: similar processes may occur on other types of phase boundaries
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: gibbs phase rule relates the number of possible phases variables such as temperature and pressure and whether or not an equilibrium will be reached
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: phases are emergent phenomena produced by the self organization of a macroscopic number of particles
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: typical samples of matter for example contain around 10 23 particles of the order of avogadro's number
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in systems that are too small even say a thousand atoms the distinction between phases disappears since the appearance of non analyticity in the free energy requires a huge formally infinite number of particles to be present
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: one might ask why real systems exhibit phases since they are not actually infinite
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the reason is that real systems contain thermodynamic fluctuations
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: when a system is far from a phase transition these fluctuations are unimportant but as it approaches a phase transition the fluctuations begin to grow in size i.e spatial extent
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: at the ideal transition point their size would be infinite but before that can happen the fluctuations will have become as large as the system itself
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: in this regime finite size effects come into play and we are unable to accurately predict the behavior of the system
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: thus phases in a real system are only well defined away from phase transitions and how far away it needs to be is dependent on the size of the system
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: there is a corollary to the emergent nature of phase phenomena known as the principle of universality
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the properties of phases are largely independent of the underlying microscopic physics so that the same types of phases arise in a wide variety of systems
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: this is a familiar fact of life
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: we know for example that the property that defines a solid resistance to deformation is exhibited by materials as diverse as iron ice and silly putty
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: the only differences are matters of scale
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: iron may resist deformation more strongly than silly putty but both maintain their shape if the applied forces are not too strong
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: reiptog einnig reipitog i daglegu mali og orsjaldan reipdrattur er ibrott bar sem tvo lio reyna meo ser krafta sina leikurinn fer oftast bannig fram ao tvo lio raoa ser a sinn hvorn enda reipis sem atti ao vera um 10 sentimetrar i bvermal
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: heildarbyngd liosins atti ao falla innan marka bess flokks sem keppt er i eoa hvort lio vera svipao ao byngd
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: mioja reipisins er merkt meo einhverjum hatti og tvo merki um fjorum metrum fra mioju reipisins i hvora att
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: mioja reipisins er svo staosett bannig ao hun er beint yfir merki a joroinni
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: hvort lio reynir svo ao toga hitt bannig ao merkio sem er nar andstaoingnum fari yfir miolinuna
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: stundum eru reglurnar bannig ao ef einhver ur ooru hvoru lioinu fellur telst bao lio hafa tapao
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: reiptog var olympiugrein fra 1900 til 1920 og hefur verio hluti af heimsleikunum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: albjooa reiptogssambandio skipuleggur heimsmeistarakeppni i reiptogi milli landslioa annao hvert ar
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: tanganjika var riki i austur afriku innan breska samveldisins og het i hofuoio a tanganjikavatni sem myndaoi vesturlandamari bess
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: bao var hluti af nylendunni bysku austur afriku bar til bretar logou hana undir sig i fyrri heimsstyrjoldinni
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: beir styrou svo landinu bar til bao fekk sjalfstaoi 9
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: desember 1961
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ario 1964 sameinaoist bao sansibar i rikinu tansaniu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: nafnio tansania er myndao ur fyrstu stofum nafnanna tanganjika og sansibar
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: s blokk lotukerfisins samanstendur af tveimur fyrstu flokkum bess alkalimalmum og jaroalkalimalmum asamt vetni og helini
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: i grunnstoou allra frumefna i bessari blokk er orkurikasta rafeindin i s svigrumi
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: frumefni s blokkar eru sterkir afsyringar fyrir utan helin sem er efnafraoilega ovirkt
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: <onlyinclude> borskfiskar fraoiheiti gadiformes eoa anacanthini eru attbalkur geislugga sem telur marga mikilvaga matfiska eins og borsk ysu og ufsa
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: borskfiskar sem nyttir eru i islenskri efnahagslogsogu eru
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: sir frederick barlett faddur 1886 latinn 1969 var breskur salfraoingur sem er bekktur fyrir ao setja fram svokallaoa skemakenningu um minni
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: hann setti fram ba hugmynd ao upprifjun minninga vari atio lituo af reynsluheimi okkar og bekkingu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: hann leit bvi ekki a minni sem upprifjun eoa endurlifgun a fastmotuoum minnissporum
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: mun nar vari ao lita a minni sem eins konar endurskopun af fyrri reynslu og hao viohorfum okkar og bekkingu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: artol eru ekki endilega begar bokin var gefin ut upprunalega
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: jona er islenskt kvenmannsnafn
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: nafnio er kvengero stytting a johannes
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: kristvaldur er islenskt karlmannsnafn
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: i starofraoi er hugtakio flatarmal notao yfir tolugildi tvivios afmarkaos svaois
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: taka ma ferhyrning sem dami lita ma a beina linu milli tveggja punkta sem einvioan vigur
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: hann hefur aoeins lengd se vigurinn ekki skooaour meo tilliti til tvi eoa brivios umhverfis
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: se annar vigur leiddur inn i damio sem er einnig einviour en situr hornrett a vio hinn fyrrnefnda vigur ba afmarka vigrarnir tveir tvivioan flot sem finna ma flatarmalio a meo bvi ao margfalda lengdir vigranna saman
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: ao jafnaoi er flatarmal gefio upp dags daglega meo malieiningum gjarnan ur si kerfinu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: til damis er flatarmal landa gefio upp i ferkilometrum km² flatarmal akurlendis i hektorum eoa hektometrum hm² og flatarmal husnaois i fermetrum m²
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: veldisvisinn hja malieiningunni ma nota til bess ao sja hversu margar svigrumsviddir umratt rum hefur
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: t.d myndu rumkilometrar km³ vera meo brjar svigrumsviddir og lysir 1km³ ba briviou rumi
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: april er 111
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: dagur arsins 112
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: a hlaupari samkvamt gregorianska dagatalinu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: 254 dagar eru eftir af arinu
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: null er eina talan sem hvorki er ja ne neikvao og er samlagningarhlutleysa taknao meo tolustafnum 0
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: telst af sumum til natturlegra talna
lines.name: Icelandic

lines.value: null er sin eigin samlagningarandhverfa en er eina rauntalan sem hefur enga margfoldunarandhverfu
